AKDsMoreRelics:StunGrenade.NAME: Stun Grenade
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies do no damage at the first turn every combat.

AKDsMoreRelics:HugeHammer.NAME: Huge Hammer
AKDsMoreRelics:HugeHammer.FLAVOR: This is not an inflatable hammer!
DESCRIPTIONS: Once every combat, if you deal at least #b150 #yunblocked damage within one turn , #ystun ALL enemies this turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:SoulAbsorber.NAME: Soul Absorber
AKDsMoreRelics:SoulAbsorber.FLAVOR: Take its soul without an attack.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy die from a non-attack damage , gain #b2 max HP.

AKDsMoreRelics:Cocktail.NAME: Cocktail
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of combat , trigger the effect of a random #ypotion .

AKDsMoreRelics:Joker.NAME: Joker
AKDsMoreRelics:Joker.FLAVOR: Show your trump card at the last minute.
DESCRIPTIONS: The last card in your hand will be played twice.

AKDsMoreRelics:PurifyingFlame.NAME: Purifying Flame
AKDsMoreRelics:PurifyingFlame.FLAVOR: The holy and powerful flame will certainly purify your curses.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRest, remove a random #yCurse from your deck.

AKDsMoreRelics:GoldMagnet.NAME: Gold Magnet
DESCRIPTIONS: Regular combats have a #b25% chance to drop a relic.

AKDsMoreRelics:PotionBackpack.NAME: Potion Backpack
AKDsMoreRelics:PotionBackpack.FLAVOR: Don't just discard your unwanted potions. Why not sell them?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a potion , gain #b30 #yGold .

AKDsMoreRelics:MagicHat.NAME: Magic Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn , #yRetain cards in your hand this turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:MagicWand.NAME: Magic Wand
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn , draw #b2 extra cards next turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:PowerCrystal.NAME: Power Crystal
AKDsMoreRelics:PowerCrystal.FLAVOR: "Power" Crystal is surely helpful with Powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cost of ALL #yPower cards reduced by #b1 .

AKDsMoreRelics:BigSale.NAME: Big Sale
AKDsMoreRelics:BigSale.FLAVOR: There are few people who'd like to buy potions , are there?
DESCRIPTIONS: Potions in shop cost #b1 #yGold . (Doesn't affect extra potions when you have #yCourier)

AKDsMoreRelics:AED.NAME: AED
AKDsMoreRelics:AED.FLAVOR: Be careful when you are trying to trigger this......
DESCRIPTIONS: If your HP is not more than #b3 at the end of combat, heal all of your HP.

AKDsMoreRelics:Wrench.NAME: Wrench
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat , temporary #yupgrade cards in your hand.

AKDsMoreRelics:HolographicShield.NAME: Holographic Shield
AKDsMoreRelics:HolographicShield.FLAVOR: Can this shield really block damage?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn , gain #yBlock equal to #b1 + the number of turns.

AKDsMoreRelics:Invincible.NAME: "Invincible"
AKDsMoreRelics:Invincible.FLAVOR: An amulet in the shape of Corrupt Heart , the invincible ruler of the spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: You lose at most #b20/30 #y(Non-Elite/Elite #yor #yBoss) HP every turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:HeavySpear.NAME: Heavy Spear
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal attack damage that is not less than half of target's max HP , kill it instantly.

AKDsMoreRelics:SpringGloves.NAME: Spring Gloves
AKDsMoreRelics:SpringGloves.FLAVOR: The more the spring compresses, the heavier the punch is.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn , gain #b6 #ytemorary #yStrength next turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:GiftCard.NAME: Gift Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Set the prices of the other two relics in shop to #b0 .

AKDsMoreRelics:Garlic.NAME: Garlic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the first turn of each combat , negate ALL #yDEBUFFs.

AKDsMoreRelics:DeathReaper.NAME: Death Reaper
AKDsMoreRelics:DeathReaper.FLAVOR: You wouldn't like to meet its owner.
DESCRIPTIONS: You deals #b120% attack damage to enemies whose HP is below #b50% .

AKDsMoreRelics:DeathCountdown.NAME: Death Countdown
AKDsMoreRelics:DeathCountdown.FLAVOR: The bell of Death will toll soon......
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of turn 8 , receive #b99999 damage.

AKDsMoreRelics:UnknownPotion.NAME: Unknown Potion
AKDsMoreRelics:UnknownPotion.FLAVOR: You have a stomachache after drinking this potion.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, gain [E] , gain #b2 #ypoison ( #b60% ) and gain #b2 #yregen ( #b30% ).

AKDsMoreRelics:GlassCrown.NAME: Glass Crown
AKDsMoreRelics:GlassCrown.FLAVOR: Protect the fragile Crown , and you will gain infinite honor and wealth.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you didn't take any unblocked attack damage in a combat , #yUpgrade a random card , gain #b5 max HP and #b30 #yGold .

AKDsMoreRelics:BottledTsunami.NAME: Bottled Tsunami
AKDsMoreRelics:BottledTsunami.FLAVOR: You can hear the tsunami runs toward you......
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup , choose a card. It will return to draw pile after played.
will return to draw pile after played.
Choose a card for

AKDsMoreRelics:SkeletonMask.NAME: Skeleton Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of turn , instantly kill enemies whose HP is below #b8 .

AKDsMoreRelics:Milk.NAME: Milk
DESCRIPTIONS: When you use a potion in combat , gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity .

AKDsMoreRelics:TowerShield.NAME: Tower Shield
AKDsMoreRelics:TowerShield.FLAVOR: Build your defence before your enemy attacks.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever enemies gain #yBlock , gain equal #yBlock next turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:HypnoticWatch.NAME: Hypnotic Watch
DESCRIPTIONS: Once every combat , if you don't play any card in your turn , #ystun ALL enemies this turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:HeroBiography.NAME: Hero Biography
AKDsMoreRelics:HeroBiography.FLAVOR: What an exciting book! But the story is too short.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn , if there's any #yPower cards in draw pile , discard pile or hand , gain [E] .

AKDsMoreRelics:ElixirOfLife.NAME: Elixir Of Life
AKDsMoreRelics:ElixirOfLife.FLAVOR: Want to live forever? Also works for robots!
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup , increase your max HP by #b50% . Start each combat with #b4 #yRegen.

AKDsMoreRelics:ColorlessHeart.NAME: Colorless Heart
AKDsMoreRelics:ColorlessHeart.FLAVOR: This pale-looking heart has a strong vitality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yUncommon or #yRare #yColorless card , #yexhaust it and heal #b3 HP.

AKDsMoreRelics:GoldenLance.NAME: Golden Lance
DESCRIPTIONS: If all cards in your hand are #yAttack , your Attacks deal double damage.

AKDsMoreRelics:BadgeOfSimplicity.NAME: Badge Of Simplicity
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play "Strike" or "Defend" each turn, gain [E] .

AKDsMoreRelics:GhostCloak.NAME: Ghost Cloak
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, if you receive #b2 unblocked attack damage in a turn , gain #b1 #yIntangible immediately.

AKDsMoreRelics:FangNecklace.NAME: Fang Necklace
AKDsMoreRelics:FangNecklace.FLAVOR: Don't hurt your self while wearing this. It's poisoned.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you take unblocked attack damage , gain #b1 #yPoison .

AKDsMoreRelics:AutobotHelper.NAME: Autobot Helper
AKDsMoreRelics:AutobotHelper.FLAVOR: Feeling busy? Try this automatic helper!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn, and automatically play the rightmost card in your hand (cost #b1 less energy).

AKDsMoreRelics:SpikeShield.NAME: Spike Shield
AKDsMoreRelics:SpikeShield.FLAVOR: Never attack a shield with spikes on it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you block attack damage from an enemy , deal equal damage to damage source.

AKDsMoreRelics:BottledSnowflake.NAME: Bottled Snowflake
AKDsMoreRelics:BottledSnowflake.FLAVOR: The last snow before the blight turn them all red.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup , choose a card. It is free to play once every combat.
free to play once every combat.
Choose a card for

AKDsMoreRelics:BloodyDagger.NAME: Bloody Dagger
AKDsMoreRelics:BloodyDagger.FLAVOR: There's a thirst for revenge in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn , when you receive unblocked attack damage , gain #b6 #yVigor .

AKDsMoreRelics:BerserkerBadge.NAME: Berserker Badge
AKDsMoreRelics:BerserkerBadge.FLAVOR: Awarded to warriors who are not afraid of pain and go forward bravely.
DESCRIPTIONS: If last room was #yCombat , gain #b2 #yStrength in this combat.

AKDsMoreRelics:EchoConch.NAME: Echo Conch
AKDsMoreRelics:EchoConch.FLAVOR: If you listen closely, you can hear the ocean.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn , you can select a card to move from #ydiscard #ypile to #ydraw #ypile .

AKDsMoreRelics:IcosahedronDice.NAME: Icosahedron Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: After #b20 turns (accumulative between combats) , gain a random #yRare #yRelic after that combat and lose effect.

AKDsMoreRelics:DonuAndDeca.NAME: Donu and Deca
AKDsMoreRelics:DonuAndDeca.FLAVOR: "The greatest work I've ever done." - The Architect
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of odd turns. Draw #b1 extra card at even turns.

AKDsMoreRelics:SpeedyHand.NAME: Speedy Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: You can add ALL #b3 cards in a card reward to your deck and #yupgrade them.
Grab them ALL!

AKDsMoreRelics:MagicOintment.NAME: Magic Ointment
AKDsMoreRelics:MagicOintment.FLAVOR: It can relieve your pain, but it can't really cure your wound.
DESCRIPTIONS: When obtained, heal #b25 HP and set its #ycounter to your current HP. At the end of combat, if your HP is lower than its #ycounter, restore HP to #ycounter and set #ycounter to the HP before recovery.

AKDsMoreRelics:BlastShield.NAME: Blast Shield
AKDsMoreRelics:BlastShield.FLAVOR: Once it's broken , it will release huge energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose ALL #yBlock because of enemy's attack, deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies.

AKDsMoreRelics:TimeMachine.NAME: Time Machine
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to record your current HP. Right click again to change your HP back later. Can be used only once.

AKDsMoreRelics:AscendersBadge.NAME: Ascenders Badge
AKDsMoreRelics:AscendersBadge.FLAVOR: The changes of the spire won't stop you from climbing higher.
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove #rAscender's #rBane in your deck.

AKDsMoreRelics:RuneOfHorror.NAME: Rune Of Horror
AKDsMoreRelics:RuneOfHorror.FLAVOR: While you are afraid of your enemies, your enemies are also afraid of you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, enemies who don't intend to #yAttack lose #b1 #yStrength .

AKDsMoreRelics:EnergySaver.NAME: Energy Saver
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] after you play a #yX-cost card.

AKDsMoreRelics:GoldAnvil.NAME: Gold Anvil
AKDsMoreRelics:GoldAnvil.FLAVOR: Best anvil to forge the best weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yupgrade a card at campfire, #yupgrade another random card in your deck.

AKDsMoreRelics:CurseTorch.NAME: Curse Torch
AKDsMoreRelics:CurseTorch.FLAVOR: No extinguishing, no discard, NO REFUNDS! HAHAHA!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse , draw #b2 extra card.

AKDsMoreRelics:Telescope.NAME: Telescope
AKDsMoreRelics:Telescope.FLAVOR: You can see the stars clearly through the fog around the spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat , right click to #yScry #b5 .

AKDsMoreRelics:CurseStaff.NAME: Curse Staff
AKDsMoreRelics:CurseStaff.FLAVOR: Once belonged to the most notorious wizard in the spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b2 #rNecronomicurse to deck. Whenever you draw a #rNecronomicurse , gain [E] and draw #b1 extra card.

AKDsMoreRelics:BluePellets.NAME: Blue Pellets
AKDsMoreRelics:BluePellets.FLAVOR: These are in fact small bombs disguised as pellets.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower, #yAttack, and #ySkill in the same turn, remove enemies' #yBlock and #yArtifact.

AKDsMoreRelics:FlameBoots.NAME: Flame Boots
AKDsMoreRelics:FlameBoots.FLAVOR: Ignite the combat with your speed!
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play the 6th card in a turn, gain #b4 #ytemporary #yStrength this turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:OverclockedChip.NAME: Overclocked Chip
AKDsMoreRelics:OverclockedChip.FLAVOR: It has a large but unstable power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Cards that cost #b2 or more have #yEthereal.

AKDsMoreRelics:BouncyBall.NAME: Bouncy Ball
AKDsMoreRelics:BouncyBall.FLAVOR: Fly upward, and bounce on the ceiling!
DESCRIPTIONS: For every card you try to draw while your hand is full, gain #b3 #yBlock instead.

AKDsMoreRelics:OakBarrel.NAME: Oak Barrel
AKDsMoreRelics:OakBarrel.FLAVOR: Life was like a cask full of mixed potions, you never know what potion you are gonna get.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b1 potion slot. Potions in combat rewards will always be #yEntropic #yBrew.

AKDsMoreRelics:Vintage.NAME: Vintage
AKDsMoreRelics:Vintage.FLAVOR: The secret of best vintage is time.
DESCRIPTIONS: If a potion stays in your potion slot for at least #b5 combats, double its effect.

combats.
(double effect)

AKDsMoreRelics:MagicEight.NAME: Magic Eight
DESCRIPTIONS: The 8th card from the left in your hand always costs #b0.

AKDsMoreRelics:SolidTime.NAME: Solid Time
AKDsMoreRelics:SolidTime.FLAVOR: A cube glittering with strange light.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yPower in your deck, lose #b6 #yMax #yHP and remove it from your deck. NL Automatically trigger the effect of the card at the start of every combat.

AKDsMoreRelics:HolyStatue.NAME: Holy Statue
AKDsMoreRelics:HolyStatue.FLAVOR: You feel blessed after praying before the statue.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next #b3 combats, #yupgrade ALL your cards. You can reset the number to #b3 at campfire.
Pray
At the start of the next 3 combats, upgrade ALL your cards.

AKDsMoreRelics:Quill.NAME: Quill
AKDsMoreRelics:Quill.FLAVOR: The words written by this quill are fluorescent. You wonder what ink it uses.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn, you can select a #yPower in your hand to #yRetain, and reduce its cost by #b1.
retain and reduce cost by 1

AKDsMoreRelics:HeartChain.NAME: Heart Chain
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP for reasons other than this relic, prevent this damage and lose equal HP later at the end of your next turn.

AKDsMoreRelics:MedievalHelmet.NAME: Medieval Helmet
AKDsMoreRelics:MedievalHelmet.FLAVOR: The helmet limits your view, so only wear it when in danger.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to enable/disable: Your attacks deal #b1/3 less damage, but you gain #yBlock equals to #yunblocked damage.

AKDsMoreRelics:BloodBag.NAME: Blood Bag
AKDsMoreRelics:BloodBag.FLAVOR: Use this when bleeding is excessive.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you lose at least #b20 HP in a combat, immediately gain #b20 #ytemporary #yHP this combat.
